created_at.description: The date the release was created.

updated_at.description: The date the release was last updated.

slug.description: A human friendly string used in the URL.

card_payments.description: Whether to allow customers to pay by card.

invoice.description: Allow customers to pay by requesting an invoice rather than using a card. Customers will be able to request to *pay-by-invoice* when purchasing this ticket.

min_donation.description: The minimum monetary amount that can be donated when purchasing this release.

payment_type.description: The type of pricing for this releases e.g. `free`, `paid`, `donation` and `degressive`.

price_ex_tax.description: The net price of the release.

tax_exclusive.description: Whether the price is exclusive of tax.

show_price.description: Whether to show the price on the event homepage.

suggested_donation.description: The suggested monetary amount that can be donated when purchasing this release.

lock_changes.description: Whether attendees can make changes to their tickets.

share_url.description: A sharable URL of a direct link to purchasing this release.

tickets_count.description: The number of tickets sold for this release.

waiting_list.description: Whether there is a waiting list.

sold_out.description: Whether the release is sold out.

off_sale.description: Whether the release is on sale or not.

expired.description: Whether the release is no longer on sale as the `end_at` has passed.

upcoming.description: Whether the release is not on sale yet as the `start_at` has not passed.

allocatable.description: Whether there is still sufficient quantity to be sold.

gross_income.description: The gross income for this release.

full_price_tickets_count.description: The number of full price tickets.

tax_description.description: A formatted description of the tax for this release.

termset_id.description: The identifier of the `Termset` that is associated with this release.

ticket_group_id.description: The identifier of the `TicketGroup` that is associated with this release.

activities.description: A list of activities associated with this `Release`.

questions.description: A list of questions that ticketholders should be asked.

tax_types.description: A list of tax types that apply to this release.

tax_components.description: A list of tax components that apply to this release.

termset.description: The `Termset` that needs to be consented to for this release.

ticket_group.description: Similar types of releases can be grouped together with a `TicketGroup`

archived.description: Is the release archived or not. Default: `false`

default_quantity.description: The default number of tickets selected for this release on the event page. Default: `0`

description.description: A statement or tag line describing the event

enable_super_combo_summary.description: For combo releases only. Include a summary of a combo in the order summary or not. Default: `true`

end_at.description: The time when the release will go off sale.

has_success_message.description: Display the custom success message or not. Default: `false`

max_tickets_per_person.description: The maximum number of tickets per registration.

min_tickets_per_person.description: The minimum number of tickets per registration.

not_a_ticket.description: Disable issuing of PDF/Apple Wallet tickets or not. For example if this release is for merchandise rather than an actual ticket. Default `false`

position.description: The position of the release in the list of all releases for the event.

price.description: The monetary amount the release should be sold for.

question_ids.description: An array of the IDs of `Questions` attached to the release. The order of the IDs represents the order in which the questions will be asked.

request_company_name.description: Do registrations which include this release require a company name.

request_vat_number.description: Do registrations which include this release require a VAT number.

require_billing_address.description: Do registrations which include this release require a billing address.

require_email.description: Do tickets for this release require an email. Default: `true`

require_name.description: Do tickets for this release require a name. Default: `false`

secret.description: Is it only accessible via a secret link or is it visible to everyone on the event page. Default: `false`

start_at.description: The time when the release will go on sale.

success_message.description: A custom message to be displayed to customers after a successful order of this release.

waiting_list_enabled_during_sold_out.description: Enable waiting list when this release sells out or not. Default: `false`
